data.title: 29 Motivating German Quotes About Success
data.meta_description: Exploring German through inspiring quotes can boost your learning journey, offering insights into pronunciation, real-life language use, vocabulary expansion, and motivational guidance.
data.text:
Today, there are many unconventional, but fun ways to learn German. From listening to exciting podcasts, watching movies, or learning via YouTube channels.

Learning German has never been easier.

Even with so many entertaining methods of language learning, sometimes you lack motivation. At those moments, foreign quotes can motivate you to continue.

So, if youâre a German learner, the following German quotes about success can show you that there's always light at the end of the tunnel.

How Can German Quotes Help You Learn German?

We know that German isnât one of the easiest languages to learn, but thatâs exactly how German quotes can help you. Here are some of the main reasons you should learn them.

German quotes help you with pronunciation. Many German quotes rhyme or use useful sounds and letters. So, besides practicing the pronunciation with German tongue twisters, you can practice by reading the quotes out loud.

When you learn German quotes, you get to see how the language is used in real life.Â

Youâll improve your vocabulary. For every language learner, especially a beginner, it is essential to learn common words but it is also important to improve your vocabulary.Â

German quotes about success can make you think about your goals and see that without an effort you canât get to the end of your learning path successfully.

29 German Inspiring Quotes About Success

In the following lines, you will find the 30 German quotes about success to motivate you whenever you arenât in a good mood and think you wonât succeed. Besides success, these also quote about life in general.

Letâs dive in.

Du schaffst das

You can do it.

Gib niemals auf!

Never give up!

âJetztâ ist die beste Zeit.

The best time is ânowâ.

Aller Anfang ist schwer

All beginnings are hard.

Man muss an sich selbst glauben. Das ist das Geheimnis.

You need to believe in yourself. Thatâs the secret.Â

Es wird nicht leichter. Du wirst stÃ¤rker.

It doesnât get easier. You get stronger.

Du hast nicht zu wenig Zeit. Du hast zu viel Zeit, die du nicht nutzt.

Itâs not that you donât have time. Itâs that you have too much time that you donât use.

Wer lÃ¤chelt, statt zu toben, ist immer der StÃ¤rkere.

The person who smiles rather than rages is always the stronger one.

Ich verliere nicht. Entweder ich gewinne, oder ich lerne.

I donât lose. Either I win, or I learn.

Jedes Problem, das man bewÃ¤ltigt, bringt einen in der Zukunft weiter. Und gibt auch neue Kraft.

Any problem you overcome will carry you forward in the future and give you new strength. (Steffi Graf)

Am Ende wird alles gut sein. Und wenn es nicht gut ist, ist es nicht das Ende.

Everything will be OK in the end. If itâs not OK, then itâs not the end.

Alle TrÃ¤ume kÃ¶nnen wahr werden, wenn wir den Mut haben, ihnen zu folgen.

All dreams can come true if we have the courage to follow them.

Aus den Steinen, die Dir in den Weg gelegt werden, kannst du etwas SchÃ¶nes bauen.

From the stones that block your way, you can build something beautiful. (Erich KÃ¤stner)

Wir mÃ¼ssen ja sowieso denken â warum nicht gleich positiv?

We need to think, anyway â why not think positively straight away?

Lieber scheiÃe tanzen als dumm herumstehen.

Better to dance badly than stand around like an idiot.Â

Leben heiÃt nicht zu warten, bis der Sturm vorbeizieht, sondern lernen, im Regen zu tanzen.

Life isnât about waiting for the storm to pass, but about learning to dance in the rain.

Man lernt nirgendwo so viel, wie in den eigenen Fehlern.

You learn nowhere so much as in your own mistakes. (Udo JÃ¼rgens)

Erfolg ist nicht endgÃ¼ltig, Misserfolg ist nicht fatal: was zÃ¤hlt ist der Mut weiterzumachen.

Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

Ziele nicht auf den Erfolg wenn du ihn willst; tu einfach was du liebst und woran du glaubst und er wird auf natÃ¼rliche Weise kommen.

Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

Geduld, Ausdauer und SchweiÃ machen eine unschlagbare Kombination fÃ¼r den Erfolg.

Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.

Zusammenkommen ist ein Beginn, Zusammenbleiben ist ein Fortschritt, Zusammenarbeiten ist ein Erfolg

Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is a success.

Die besten Gedanken kommen allzeit hinterdrein.

The best thoughts always come second.

Ein erfolgreicher Mann ist einer, der eine feste Grundlage legen kann mit den Steinen, die andere nach ihm geworfen haben.

A successful man is the one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.

Wer rastet, der rostet.

He who rests grows rusty.

Anfangen ist leicht, Beharren eine Kunst.

Starting is easy, persistence.

Aus Schaden wird man klug.

Failure makes smart.

Man muss die Dinge nehmen, wie sie kommen.

You have to take things the way they come.

Ãbung macht den Meister.

Practice makes perfect.

Man muss das UnmÃ¶gliche versuchen, um das MÃ¶gliche zu erreichen.

You have to try the impossible to achieve the possible. (Hermann Hesse)

Wenn der Tag nicht dein Freund war, dann war er dein Lehrer.

If today wasnât your friend, it was your teacher.

Final Thoughts

Now that you know German quotes about success, you can get back to them whenever youâre not feeling yourself.

If youâre interested in becoming fluent in a new language, check out these top online learning resources: Kick off your learning with Babbel, where interactive, enjoyable lessons are designed to blend smoothly into your routine, fostering fast and effective language learning. For those aiming for an in-depth understanding, Udemy provides a broad spectrum of courses from basic to advanced levels. To enhance your speaking skills, Preply connects you with native speakers for personalized coaching, ensuring significant improvement.
